text: Matthew P. "Pat" Kennedy (28 January 1908 - 16 June 1957) was an American basketball referee. He was known for his emphatic, theatrical style. Kennedy is a member of the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame. Category:1908 births Category:1957 deaths Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:People from Hoboken, New Jersey Category:Basketball referees
title: Matthew P. Kennedy
